rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen space combined with dining area, designed for social interactions with ample natural light. This room incorporates a central island to enhance functionality.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Optimized for the north-east corner to invite positive energy.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet, ensuring privacy and comfort.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Placed in the south-west quadrant for stability and calm.

rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for children with storage and play areas integrated.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Positioned in the east quadrant to promote learning and energy.

rooms.description: A quiet study or reading room with bookshelves and natural lighting.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Placed in the north corner to enhance focus.

rooms.description: A multipurpose room that can serve as a guest bedroom or home office.
rooms.vastu_compliance: Allocated to west quadrant for creative inspiration.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the north direction for auspicious entry.
Service exit leading to the terrace and garden area.

additional_features.description: Access staircase from ground floor leading to the rooftop terrace.

notes: This design integrates industrial aesthetics with farmhouse elements, ensuring functionality and comfort. The plan adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles for optimal energy flow. All dimensions are approximate and should be refined during detailed planning.
